title: API Gateway Rest API to Lambda to Bedrock with response streaming
description: Creates an API Gateway REST API and Python Lambda function that provides a streaming response from the LLMs in Amazon Bedrock.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates how to use an Amazon API Gateway REST API with response streaming to a Python Lambda function. This template includes an response streaming-enabled Amazon API Gateway REST API that invokes a Python Lambda function, which uses Lambda Web Adaptor with Fast API to enable response streaming.

To enable response streaming with a Python Lambda function, we use [Lambda Web Adaptor](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/compute/using-response-streaming-with-aws-lambda-web-adapter-to-optimize-performance/) and [Fast API](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-web-adapter/tree/main/examples/fastapi-response-streaming-zip).
This pattern deploys an API Gateway REST API and Python Lambda function which calls Bedrock, that is end-to-end enabled for response streaming
